comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 6.1; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E; Tablet PC 2.0; InfoPath.3)
Build Identifier: 

I create html page with use Ajax. Ajax change part HTML page new content with textbox and etc. + new JavaScript for work with new id elements. New content, FF4 show correct, but JS not worked. In Web Console i see, what JavaScript appeal to new id elements, but FF4 informed, what id is not defined.

My FF4 installed default, add-on not installed.
In IE, Chrome, Opera worked correct.


Reproducible: Always

comments.text:
This test URL will be work one week. 
http://www.cus.kalugaenergo.ru/FF4/Account/LogOnUrl?name=demo&password=demo

Test 1.
1. Click link "Редактирование НСИ".
2. Select node in tree "RSK". (Load new part htlm + JS for work new id).
3. Change in textbox (id "PropertyPwSName") name node.
4. Open Web console.
5. Click "Ok".
6. In Web console display "PropertyPwSName is not defined".

Test 2.
1. Open all nodes.
2. Open Web console.
3. Drag node "Folder 1" in "Folder 2".
4. In Web console display "confirmstring is not defined ".

Thanks.
